title: Tranquil Munnar Plantation Estate Stay with Daily Breakfast, One Dinner & Guided Plantation Trek
description:
Wake to the heady scent of tea, cardamom and coffee at Windermere Estate Munnar, a gorgeous estate perched high on a hilltop in one of Southern India's most popular hill stations. Featuring just 18 rooms built around a magnificent bungalow in early 1930s, this serene retreat promises an intimate escape. Cool off in the beautiful pool, head to the restaurant to relish lip-smacking meals, take endless walks through the plantation, or head to the estate's famous 70ft-tall boulder with most amazing sunrise or sunset views.

Just a three-hour drive from Cochin or an overnight journey from Bengaluru and Chennai, this farmhouse-style estate will encourage you to embrace slow living with its panoramic vistas of the plantations, mountains and more.
offer_address: Munnar-Bison Valley Road, Pothamedu, Munnar, Kerala 685612 India
